      class  Item

    • Uses of ItemInterface in game

      Classes in game that implement ItemInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Bomb
      A bomb which is a type of Item and hurt Actors when it explodes.
      class  Corpse
      A corpse item which is portable and created when an actor is dead.
      class  Food
      A food item which is portable and can be eaten.
      class  Plank
      A primitive weapon.
      class  PortableItem
      Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
      class  RangedWeapon
      An ranged weapon which is a type of weapon item which uses ammunition.
      class  Shotgun
      A shotgun which is a type of ranged weapon that has a short range.
      class  SimpleClub
      A type of Weapon Item that only appears when a Zombie dropped its limb
      class  SniperRifle
      A sniple rifle which is a type of ranged weapon that rewards patience.
      class  Vehicle
      An item which represents a vehicle that moves actor to other map.
      class  ZombieClub
      A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie arm
      class  ZombieMace
      A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie leg
